contents.text: Thank you for calling Sift Science, where we protect your business from fraud through the power of digital trust.
For sales and product information, press 1 to choose that menu.
To speak with a sales representative about our B2B fraud prevention solutions, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with sales about enterprise fraud prevention solutions and arrange a demo
I’d like to explore Sift’s B2B fraud prevention solution for my veteran-owned online store.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your B2B fraud prevention API and explore its ML capabilities.
I want to talk to someone about fraud prevention options for my small business.
I’d like to speak with a sales rep about your B2B fraud prevention APIs for my startup selling physics lab kits online.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, or legal compliance inquiries, press 2 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing and legal team.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing tiers and licensing terms for the fraud detection platform
I need detailed pricing, licensing, and compliance info for protecting my nonprofit’s transactions.
I need a breakdown of your usage-based pricing tiers and any PCI compliance or licensing requirements.
I need information on pricing and legal requirements for your service.
I need detailed pricing, licensing options, and compliance info for academic use of your fraud detection service.

contents.text: For technical support and account assistance, press 2 to choose that menu.
For help with implementation or integration of our AI fraud detection platform, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to an integration specialist.

navigationGoals: I'm integrating the fraud detection API and need technical guidance from an integration specialist
I’d like assistance integrating Sift’s AI fraud detection API into my platform.
I’m looking for integration guidance to embed your fraud detection SDK into our Node.js pipeline.
Can someone help me set up and integrate your AI fraud detection on my website?
I’m integrating your AI fraud detection platform into our research group’s payment portal and need technical integration support.

contents.text: For account and billing questions, press 2 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to an account services representative.

navigationGoals: I have questions about my bill and need to update my payment information
I have questions about my account billing and need to update my payment method.
I want to update my payment method and get a copy of last month’s invoice for our account.
I have questions about my account billing and charges.
I want to update our account billing details and clarify charges on last month’s invoice.
